titles.title: To extend the temporary reduction of duty on palm fatty acid distillate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/12/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 2011, and increase the temporarily reduced rate on monocarboxylic fatty acids derived from palm oil.
